name: I SOLD MY TROMBONE (for rocknroll) repress
description: The initial 500 press has been sold out.  Originally released December 1990.  There were 38 overruns, so I have "repressed" the flexi compilation as a "limited edition" purple X version.  8" square yellow flexi ep, with HUMIDIFIER of Connecticut [with Jim Wilbur of Superchunk and John King of Spent], FACE OF DECLINE of Sioux Falls, & THOMPSON'S DISEASE of San Diego.  3 songs, 3 inserts, 1 cover.  Price is postpaid.  Thanks.

name: I SOLD MY TROMBONE (for rocknroll) flexi compilation
description: A 3 band, 3 song, 8 inch square yellow flexi compilation, featuring HUMIDIFIER (with James Wilbur of superchunk), FACE OF DECLINE, and THOMPSON'S DISEASE.  Limited to 500.  Released December 1990.  Xerox cover and two inserts with band information, lyrics, etc.
